blocks.label: Personal | Breakfast
blocks.rationale: Fixed morning routine - nourishment and mental reset before work activities.

blocks.label: Personal | Morning Routine
blocks.rationale: Fixed personal preparation time for optimal day start.

blocks.label: Personal | Commute to Guild Row
blocks.rationale: Fixed travel time to primary work location.

blocks.label: Echo | Email Triage & Priority Setting
blocks.rationale: Process AI-LEAF meeting invites and ResearchGate follow-up. High cognitive capacity time optimal for communication decisions.

blocks.label: Echo | Daily Standup & Team Meeting Prep
blocks.rationale: Non-negotiable daily standup with 30min prep time - fixed commitment requiring dedicated focus.

blocks.label: Echo | Today Page Implementation - Backend Session Management
blocks.rationale: High-energy morning time perfect for complex backend development. Core system work requiring deep focus.

blocks.label: Personal | Lunch Break
blocks.rationale: Midday energy reset and nourishment break.

blocks.label: Echo | Today Page UI Components & State Management
blocks.rationale: Post-lunch energy suitable for frontend development. Visual components require sustained but moderate focus.

blocks.label: Professional | Client Call
blocks.rationale: Non-negotiable client commitment - fixed external meeting requiring preparation and focus.

blocks.label: Professional | Email & Communications
blocks.rationale: Dedicated afternoon admin block for action items. Exactly 45 minutes for processing responses and follow-ups.

blocks.label: Echo | Today Page UX Testing & Integration
blocks.rationale: Afternoon energy suitable for testing and integration work. Requires attention to detail but less creative thinking.

blocks.label: Personal | Commute to Gym
blocks.rationale: Fixed transition time to gym for strength training session.

blocks.label: Personal | Strength Training
blocks.rationale: Fixed workout session - important for physical health and mental clarity.

blocks.label: Personal | Commute Home & Decompress
blocks.rationale: Travel home and mental transition from gym to evening activities.

blocks.label: Echo | Evening Review & Tomorrow Planning
blocks.rationale: Reflect on Today page development progress and plan next implementation steps.

blocks.label: Personal | Unwind & Personal Time
blocks.rationale: Open time for relaxation and personal interests.

blocks.label: Personal | Prepare for Tomorrow
blocks.rationale: Review commitments and ensure readiness for tomorrow's priorities.

reasoning.scheduling_strategy: Energy-optimized development schedule with complex backend work during peak morning hours, UI development post-lunch, and testing in afternoon. Fixed commitments respected with adequate transition time.
reasoning.energy_optimization: High-energy morning blocks for complex backend development, moderate afternoon energy for UI work and testing, low-energy evening for review and planning.
reasoning.priority_sequencing: Backend session management first (requires deep focus), followed by UI components (visual work), then testing (detail-oriented), with communications scheduled during natural energy dips.
reasoning.recovery_planning: Strategic breaks at lunch and between major work blocks, gym session for physical reset, evening wind-down for mental recovery.
